thread.section_title: Dresslink 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Dresslink 的点评意见 | dresslink.com
thread.title: Steve Smowton
thread.title_full: Dresslink 的点评人 Steve Smowton

author: Steve Smowton
title: Steve Smowton
text: The worst operation on the internet I have come across. The 20% first time customer didn't work, so I did a live chat to their customer representative. He said he would apply it when the order went therough so I placed the order. No discount was ever replied. The goods were received a month later. They were shoddy and a ridiculously small size for a 'large' - nothing like the sizing guide they promote on their website. When I told them I anted to return it, They said it would be at my cost to China which made it not worthwhile. DON'T BUY FROM THEM!!!
